basics.name: Shyam Sunder Verma
basics.label: Lead & Manager, Full Stack Team
basics.summary:
Shyam is passionate​ to​ problem solving, he eagerly learn​s and adapt to​ solve​ problems. 
He leads his team by example and firmly believes in empathy & innovation driven teams.
He​ represented Ready Bytes in the​ delegation​ of​ NASSCOM’s​ first​ India-US​ Startup​ Konnect​. (2015)

Shyam founded Ready Bytes in 2009. In last 12 years it have built more than 10+ web/mobile products. 
● PayPlans: Worlds #1 Joomla Payment Component (2009-2017, Sold)
● Products Review​ Analysis &  Recommendation Engine​ ReadyViews​ (2015-2018 Shutdown)
● Exchange​ Rate​ analysis​ platform​ ExchangeRateIQ​ (2016-2018, Sold)
● 15+​ mobile​ apps​ in​ last​  years (2015-Present)

Ready Bytes have worked for clients as well
● MoviesEveryWhere: Most affordable video streaming platform for film festivals (2020-Present)
● SafiMoney : Cross-Border and Unified Wallet for Personal, Business, Remittance purpose. (2017-20)
● Film Distribution and Rights Management (2019-20)
● chittorgarh.com : India #1 IPO website, We worked in optimization and mobile apps (2017-Present)

His Skills 
● Domain: eCommerce, Finance, CMS, Video
● Technologies: Web​ Apps, Mobile Apps, Crawlers, Scrapers JAM Stack, Headless API, Serverless
● Data​ Structure​ and​ Algorithms
● JavaScript, PHP, C,​ C++,​ 
● MySQL,​ Redis,​ MongoDB,​ Neo4J, GraphQL

Shyam​ graduated in Computer Science in 2005, His early work during his education and job (2003-2009) was around hardware compilers and optimizations. During graduation he published 2 international​ papers on​ power​ optimization​ in​ mobiles​ for​ multimedia​ softwares.

His current research & work focus includes Micro-Service, Event-Oriented, Serverless Systems.
He can be contacted at: shyam@readybytes.in

projects.name: PayPlans
projects.summary:
PayPlans is an open-source membership software for selling your services online. It provides automatic subscriptions and effortless billing management.


1. A Walk in a Park: PayPlans installer makes it damn easy for you to install the software and start selling membership in seconds.
2. Wallet & Transactions: Wallet acts as a money bag for each and every customer. Here, the amount paid by the customer is received and consumed according to the subscribed plan. Each and every transaction is monitored and entries are created for every reception of amount and dispatch of the amount.
3. Modifiers: These can be used to add additional taxes on already created plans. Also, discounts can be given in a similar manner.
4. Theme Builder: It is available with premium plan of PayPlans 2.0. Here, you can create your own themes to provide a customized look to your front-end content. Internally, we have provided you with 35 eye-catching themes.
5. MaaS (Migration as a Service): You can easily migrate to PayPlans from other subscription systems like AMember, AmbraSubs, AEC and many others. For such matters you have to contact our development team.
6. Registration Integration: PayPlans system is integrated with Joomla, JomSocial and Community Builder registration. PayPlans also provide quick registration process by itself.
7. Application Integration: Integrated with many known applications and processors like Paypal processor, JomSocial, JSPT, Emailer, Docman, Google Analytics, Moset Tree, K2 and JUGA .
8. Unlimited Membership Plans: Your membership site can have as many “plans” as you wish to offer. There is no restriction on how many plans you can create. Fixed, Recurring, Trial 1 , Trial 2, Forever fee any type of plan can be set-up.
9. Powerful Discount System: In PayPlans, Discount coupon code is easily generated. Coupon code can be usable Yearly, Monthly or Daily basis according to requirement.
